views.original: This is your survival kit. It formerly contained a Xenon Army Knife and a can of dehydrated water.
Written on the electronic gadget are the words DIALECT TRANSLATOR. On one end is a dial and a light (currently on).
This is a data storage cartridge. On it are the words ASTRAL BODY FORMATION: THE UNTOLD STORY.
This is definitely a rock.
Written on the electronic gadget are the words DIALECT TRANSLATOR. On one end is a dial and a light (currently dim).
The Orat part seems to consist of a spiny piece of bone with a small amount of somewhat less solid material clinging to one end.
The keycard is a flat rectangular piece of synthetic material which is magnetically keyed for passing check stations. Written in tiny letters are the words ``Beek and Hinder Security Systems''.
This is a piece of highly reflective view shield glass from the escape pod. Due to its special design there are no sharp edges.
This is the power key to the sand skimmer.
This is a vessel of that acrid-yet-buoyant Keronian Ale.
This is your bargain jetpack.
The buckazoid is a flat piece of a precious alien metal. You have %v124 of them.
This is your survival kit. It contains a Xenon Army Knife and a can of dehydrated water.
This is a cylinder of dehydrated water. At the top of the cylinder is a regulator and a short nozzle. On the side is a label.
This is a Sarien ID card. The name on the card is Butston Freem. You wonder if this is a common Sarien name.
This small item is a Pulseray. It delivers concentrated pulses of energy in the direction it is pointed.
The smoke bomb appears to be of the impact detonation variety. You don't want to be to close to this thing when it discharges.
This is a small remote control unit. On it is a button. You wonder what it controls remotely.
It is a plant you are not familiar with.
This is your handy-dandy Xenon Army Knife.
